articles.title: This Android smartwatch released last year still outruns the competition - and it's on sale
articles.description: The OnePlus Watch 2 beats the Pixel Watch in almost every way, with its long-lasting battery, vibrant screen, and durable design. Grab it on sale now for Memorial Day.

articles.description: The best noise cancelling headphones under $200.

articles.title: Samsung will sell you the Frame TV for up to $1,800 off - with a free bezel included
articles.description: Samsung is slashing prices on various Frame TV models and offering free bezels with select purchases going into Memorial Day weekend.

articles.title: Huge Dell Memorial Day Deals: Save Hundreds on Laptops and Desktops
articles.description: The holiday weekend is here, and it's time to save a whole on a wide variety of Dell hardware, including gaming laptops, along with affordable and powerful desktop workstations.

articles.title: Valve CEO Gabe Newell’s Neuralink competitor is expecting its first brain chip this year
articles.description: Starfish Neuroscience, founded by Valve CEO Gabe Newell, has revealed plans to produce its very first brain chip later this year.

articles.title: Bavarian Podcast Works - Reaction Show: Bayern Munich was bested by Liverpool for Florian Wirtz...now what?
This Beautiful BMW Wagon Is Actually Going Into Production
articles.description: BMW debuted the new Concept Speedtop at this year's Concorso d'Eleganza Villa d'Este in Lake Como, Italy. It packs a powerful V-8 and is limited to just 70 examples.

articles.title: Google Confirms AI Mode Reporting Coming To Search Console
articles.description: Google has confirmed that AI Mode reporting will be coming to Google Search Console. It is currently not yet in Search Console, but it will be coming as part of the AI Mode rollout.

articles.title: Microsoft Announced Edit, New Open-Source Command-Line Text Editor for Windows at Build 2025
